about.title: I'm Noa.O, a developer who enjoys building performant interfaces.
about.subtitle: Passionate about entrepreneurship and coding, I try to combine both. I want to give myself the means to make a living from what I love.
about.technologies: Here are some of the technologies I work with.

list.title: Altiora - In Development
list.description: SaaS platform empowering users to optimize trading, build better habits, achieve goals, and master time management—all in one place.

list.description: SaaS platform for poker players to manage their entire bankroll efficiently.

list.title: YH Trading - 2025
list.description: A trading platform for traders to manage their entire trades with tracker and statistics.

list.title: TodoList - 2024
list.description: A basic todo list app built with JS.

list.title: First Portfolio - 2024
list.description: This project showcases my first personal website portfolio, highlighting my skills and experiences as a developer and my first step to learn ThreeJS.
